title: By the King, a proclamation for the continuance of His Maiesties farthing tokens
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
notes: "Giuen at our manour of Greenewich, the one and twentieth day of Iune, in the twelth yeere of our reigne ..."--P. [2].
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
